name: Miku's Musical Run
description:
very crusty school project where we had to use new technologies, so this is mostly programmed by ChatGPT with assets from Dall-E and Craiyon

music and SFX from Bit.Trip Runner and Project Diva

Press space to start the game (for some reason the webgl is very cropped but there was text that was supposed to say that there)

press space to jump, hold for a softer fall.

Down for fast fall. and right for attack.

the generation isn't perfect and may sometimes make impossible levels, restart if that happens, also you can get softlocked by running into walls that have no ground underneath them, you can try to use the attack to get out, but otherwise restart.
